abbr.description: The abbreviation to show when using circle styling.

ariaLabel.description: Accessible label when control does not need to render label tag.

breakWord.description: Whether the text break class will be applied (adjusting to the parent box width)

circle.description: Whether circle styling should be applied.

color.options: primary | info | success | warning | danger | secondary
color.description: The (background) color of the badge.  Defaults to 'primary'.

text.description: The text to display in the badge.

wrap.description: Whether text wrap styling should be applied.
